summary: A test suite that validates the functionality of various linear algebra primitives in the lax.linalg module, including eigenvalue decomposition, matrix transposition, random matrix generation, Schur decomposition, selection operations, symmetric products, Toeplitz matrix handling, and tridiagonal system solving.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable and accurate linear algebra computations for scientific and machine-learning applications by detecting regressions and performance issues in the underlying library.
